Test Name: Alpha Globin Cluster Locus Deletion/Duplication Analysis (MLPA)
Purpose: To detect deletions and duplications within the alpha globin gene cluster (HBA1 and HBA2) using multiplex ligation-dependent probe amplification.
Equipment: MLPA kit specific for alpha globin gene cluster, thermal cycler, capillary electrophoresis system (e.g., ABI PRISM Genetic Analyzer), Bioanalyzer or equivalent DNA quantification system, analytical software for MLPA data analysis (e.g., Coffalyser.NET)
